|brand = Linksys |model = WMP11 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = WMP11 |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 1260 |device_id = 3873 |subvendor_id = 1737 |subdevice_id = 3874 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PKW-WMP11,O6M-MW251 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:06:25
|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3874; |chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = BroMax |manuf_model = BW251 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/06/2001 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "3752-42510001" is silkscreened on the Mini PCI to PCI adapter. The device is a [[BroMax MW251]] (FCC photos state MW250-IF).. as such the FCC ID of the parent OEM product has been assigned to it.
This device is a Mini PCI wireless module on a Mini PCI -> PCI adapter.
"ISL37400M SN REV C" is silkscreened on the Mini PCI wireless module. This device is clearly based on the [http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheets/700/261518_DS.pdf Intersil ISL37400M reference design].
[http://djbnetbsd.drivehq.com/PC/NetBSD/PRISM/models.html On djb's PRISM models page] <small>([https://deviwiki.com/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/PRISM%20Models.html archived here])</small> :states the device is a Amtron MW251
[http://edseek.com/~jasonb/articles/linux_wireless2.shtml ''Wireless 802.11b on Linux, Part 2'' on '''edseek.com'''] :Below '''wlanng''' info dump is sourced from here... {{wlanng_hw |nicid=8013 |nic_ver=1.0.0 |pri_id=0015 |pri_ver=1.0.7 |sta_id=001f |sta_ver=1.3.5}}
